thread.title_full: Pets Best Pet Health Insurance reviewed by Chantal Westerman

author: Chantal Westerman
title: Chantal Westerman
text:
I usually don't write a lot of reviews but I have to write this one.
I have been with pets best for 2 1/2 years and it never ceases to amaze me how fast they are to respond to any issue I have and more importantly, the staff that I talk to, the first people I call are.... so kind and so genuine. The last time I called, I was so frightened about something that was wrong with my goldendoodle named Charlotte. She had a gigantic wart that had grown on her ear and it just looked awful and I was beside myself. The young woman I talked to was so kind and so understanding and said "don't you worry Chantal we will take care of this and your Charlotte will be fine." Suddenly, I felt 100% better and indeed they did take care of it.
I signed up for auto deposit which by the way, is a very good thing to do and they had refunded my money for my claim in less than seven days. I know I sound like I work for pets best but I assure you I don't. I live in Sun Valley Idaho and I do dog rescue and hospice care. They are simply fabulous.
